// Sign of (p-q).dot(r-q)
genericPoint(p:lpx,lpy,lpz,dp)
rx ry rz
genericPoint(q:lqx,lqy,lqz,dq)
dqp = dq * dp
pxq = lpx * dqp
pyq = lpy * dqp
pzq = lpz * dqp
rxq = rx * dq
ryq = ry * dq
rzq = rz * dq
lqxd = lqx * dp
lqyd = lqy * dp
lqzd = lqz * dp
lx = pxq - lqxd
ly = pyq - lqyd
lz = pzq - lqzd
gx = rxq - lqx
gy = ryq - lqy
gz = rzq - lqz
dx = lx * gx
dy = ly * gy
dz = lz * gz
d1 = dx + dy
d = d1 + dz
